item.title: [PI] Adding Pk Points System
item.dc:creator: @Celeron Celeron
item.description:
@Celeron wrote:

[size=18pt]NVM Fixed it my self :D[/size]

Hello Moparscapians

My problem is:
i added “pkPoints” in Player.java like this:

public int pkPoints = 0;

then i added this add Playersave.java

} else if (token.equals(“pkPoints”)) {
p.pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and this

characterfile.write("pkPoints = ", 0, 12);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.pkPoints).length());

compiling went just fine, but when i log out i get this error:
